name: Hi, Yuri
description:
Our project aims to comfort the communities that are mentally and physically suffered from social distancing of the pandemic. The unique interactive experiences between yuri and individuals will help people rebuild their vigor and further mental health. It is important for people to continue to step up for social distancing and make mental health a priority by investing in a long-term, system-wide response.

Group Members: 

Michelle Lin: Character Design, 3D Modelling, Mini Games, Other Coding

Jieyi Li:  AR Games, Mini Games, UI Design

Yuanfen Gu: Graphic Design, 2D Arts, UI Design

Yutao Zhu: 3D Scene Modelling

Yuting Cui: 2D Yuri (Usual Status), Mini-game: Food Catcher (partly)
